snippet: President Obama has been undermined by his own statements, like the one where he said Iraq was “sovereign, stable and self-reliant” with “a representative government.”
abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama must confront fact that his past statements about Iraq have come back to haunt him as he prepares to address nation to explain his plan to defeat Islamic State in Iraq and Syria militants; Obama will try to convince Americans that ISIS represents clear threat to national security in state that is hardly stable.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has been undermined by his own statements, like the one where he said Iraq was “sovereign, stable and self-reliant” with “a representative government.”

headline.main: A President Whose Assurances Have Come Back to Haunt Him
headline.print_headline: A President Whose Assurances Have Come Back to Haunt Him

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
